item.title: 001 Create Static Blog With Hugo and Github Pages in 5 Minutes
item.description: Todo [x] Download hugo releases for windows 10 https://gohugo.io/getting-started/installing/ Extract and copy hugo.exe to your HUGO_PATH Add your HUGO_PATH to environment path. Window Icon + ‘env’ => Edit System Variables Eg: C:/softwares/hugo Open system environment variable Add new hugo path Add hugo path to path Test hugo --help [x] Create new hugo site hugo new site blog.jsguru.net --force [x] Install new theme [x] Add new post hugo new [archtype]/[post-name].
